title: Beautiful loft apartment
posting_body: ['This large loft style one bedroom has a unique open layout that gives the unit a large airy feeling.', 'The living room is large bright and open with vaulted ceilings and painted hard wood flooring and large windows throughout.', 'The living room has double glass doors leading to your private deck over looking the back of the property large enough for a table and lounge chairs you can make the most of the warm months with outdoor living.', 'This top floor unit is very quite and private.', 'The bedroom is located upstairs and again has high ceilings and large windows overlooking the property.', ' The property is about 2 acres and has old grown trees and backs onto the Pound Ridge Reservation.', ' You have the convenience and privacy of a home without the maintenance and extra space to take care of.', 'Electricity and Heat are not included in the rent.', 'Snow plowing, shoveling, landscaping, garbage removal included in the rent.']
